title: Barbed Penis Anyone? A Lively Discussion on Male versus Female Grooming
itunes:title: Barbed Penis Anyone? A Lively Discussion on Male versus Female Grooming
description:
This week on the Basic and the Brain, our dear friend Josh Lee (UX and product designer) joins us for another episode to talk all things grooming. We discuss skin care regimen, hair removal processes (including nightmarish stories of Nair burns, butthole waxing and VERY close shaves to some pretty sensitive parts), the difference in male versus female grooming(including resources/time spent + pain threshold) and dive into the topic of whether or not each sex would bother to continue grooming or partaking in these levels of "self care" if the other sex no longer existed. Is the male or female gaze defining our standards of beauty when it comes to grooming or is this all self inflicted?



Join us this week as we debate who has it worse, give you a detailed story of barbed cat dick and debate whether or not our world is all about survival of the fittest or survival of the prettiest!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
